website_summaries.verdict: A really useful safe with a biometric function that works well. However, this safe is not fireproof.
pros: Includes three shelves that can be adjusted to fit your valuables
Almost  two cubic feet of storage space – a larger size than many cabinet safes on the market
Biometric fingerprint recognition feature works well and is easy to use and set up
cons: This safe is not rated fireproof

customer_reviews.title: The safe itself is good. The keys
customer_reviews.text: The safe itself is good. The keys, combination pad, and biometric scanner all work well. The problem lies in the fact that, like others, mine came with a broken clip that is supposed to hold up the shelves but multiple emails and a post on Facebook inquiring about how to get a replacement have gone unanswered. In the month I've been trying to contact the manufacturer I've had absolutely no customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our safe LCD display stopped working after one month which ...
customer_reviews.text: Our safe LCD display stopped working after one month which meant we could not open it with pin or fingerprint. At first I thought manufacturer was unresponsive but I was wrong. I had used the wrong email address. As soon as I corrected that the company contacted me immediately and assured us they would replace the safe but carefully walked us through a self repair (checking connections to LCD) and it worked. Just a loose connection that was remedied by simple plugging it in. I suspect it must have been loosened in shipping or installing. Bummer yes but company totally backed up their product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great safe for Pistols
customer_reviews.text: Fits 3 vaultec dual gun holders perfectly. Great safe at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Pforr

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good, and the 50 lb
customer_reviews.text: I am 78 years old, and have had no problem with fingerprint. This is an ideal product for someone with a small handgun collection. The quality is good, and the 50 lb. weight keeps most folks from running off with it. You can unlock the safe 3 ways so that if you forget one way, you have 2 other choices. Locking requires just 1 button to press and hold. Safe should be very good to keep children away from your guns. It's not a fire safe. I'm happy to recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended and can program like 20 something prints. It does come with a set of keys for back up. I got this to keep the guys that live with me away from my cigs and stuff. The first time my hubby gave them one of my cigs from in there I took his finger print out lol. It works fast and it's crazy easy to program.
customer_reviews.author: Sam white-fox

customer_reviews.title: Completely stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this safe for 1.5 years without any issues but the first time I changed the batteries everything stopped working. I’ve tried contacting Viking but they have no phone number. All they offer is an email address and a promise to contact you within 48 hours, which they didn’t. Poor quality product and even worse customer service. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rochebm

customer_reviews.title: Poor and Shotty Service from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Safe for my Handguns and after 6 months the lousy thing stops locking!! And I've been using the key pad because the finger print scanner quite working after 4 months,I called Amazon today to try to rectify this Defective Safe, And I was told that it's past 30 days and I have to go Online TO VIKING And see if they'll help me with this UNSAFE Unit - I have the thing Bolted to the floor and Studs in the wall thinking that I have a Safe that's going to Work Longer than 6 months - DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Belle

customer_reviews.title: Not such a good fingerprint reader
customer_reviews.text: Nice safe but the fingerprint reader won't pick up my mom's fingerprints because she's 85 and as you get older the fingerprints seem to fade a little bit
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Harris

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: First unit received door was broken. Second unit received electronic lock defective. Amazon was great with handling the returns as always but DONT waste your time. This item is low quality junk. Look else where and save yourself time and frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Tim P

customer_reviews.title: OK safe for day to day use....
customer_reviews.text: after owning about two months, the biometric is working on and off... and the response time on the biometric is much slower than the newer safe in the market. If you need to have a quick access to a firearm, this is not recommended. It takes about 3 to 5 seconds for the biometric to open the safe. Therefore, don't rely on this safe for a keep draw of a fire arm. Day to day security safe, it maybe ok. Even that, the biometric only works on and off all the time. If it's not for the price, i would put a one-star on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Guofu Chen

customer_reviews.title: The keys are stock and the box cannot be closed
customer_reviews.text: I was unfortunate with this product because as I try setting it up the key got stock in the hole which made it impossible to close the security box again. I wrote the company but the instructions they sent me didn't work so I still don't have a security box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The internal specs say the safe is 12. 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: The internal specs say the safe is 12.5 inches wide. The problem is the door does not open to 90 degrees, so it is only 10.75 wide. Plus, the lock takes up enough interior room that the width at the lock is just 9.0 inches. We had bought this to store my wife's jewelry in small drawers, which are 11.5 inches wide. Needless to say, we had to return this. But we always appreciate Amazon's return policy - that's why we buy so much from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ron in OB

customer_reviews.title: Low quality junk
customer_reviews.text: The re-taped bottom of the package upon receipt was the first sign of bad things to follow: When I opened the safe, there was a bad musty odor from inside. One of the flimsy shelf's' metal trim had started to rust (see picture) Then key lock failed to work after the first few cycles; something was loose so I peeked - visible rust. The lower part of the safe door visibly doesn't even stay flush to the frame, so the "no-pry" claim falls a little flat. Overall, very bad manufacturing quality, exacerbated by what it seems a prolonged storage in a damp area. Now I have to deal with the hassle of lugging it to an UPS store.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Beast mode safe
customer_reviews.text: It's built like a tank. I expected the led lights to dim, but after a few years they are still going strong after two years. The internals hold up pretty well to abuse. Response time has been spot on in a crunch. In a worst case situations combined with bio-metric room locks it will give you the time you need to arm yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Alex & Dawn

customer_reviews.title: It's almost perfect. The only problem is that the clips meant ...
customer_reviews.text: It's almost perfect.The only problem is that the clips meant to hold up the shelves were all broken when I got the safe.
customer_reviews.author: trista franzen

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this purchase and it came very quickly with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first safe. I was able to figure everything out rather quickly. I have to re-do my finger though because it now doesn't open as much. I feel so much safer having my pistols in a safe. The construction is solid for the price. I'm very happy with this purchase and it came very quickly with no dings.
customer_reviews.author: Bacardigirl

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the safe when i recived it it did not ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the safe when i recived it it did not xome with the keys or anything i jad to contact the manufacturer they're willing to help me but since I didn't purchase it from them I have to pay for the keys $40
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crack lcd
customer_reviews.text: The Safe arrived and like the last reviewer said the lcd screen was cracked upom arrival probably due to shipping. The lcd Functions fine. Fingerprint and pass code was easy to set up. The shelves are a bit flimsy and move a lot. I was hoping the safe would weigh more. I was surprised as how light it is. This safe needs to be bolted or anyone can pick it up. I brought it up one flight of stairs and it was easy. Overall it's an ok safe.
customer_reviews.author: B. Chiu

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one on 9/24/16 and it arrived on 9/27/16 by UPS, Wow! What a surprising speed of delivery. No damage and no loose items inside, just instruction pamphlet, some hardware and keys in plastic packages. I started using it immediately and all three features of unlocking and locking work flawlessly. Even though I am 73 and my wife is 66 years old, we have no problem registering our fingerprints. Thanks to Viking's 500 DPI Optical Sensor, it works every single time. Wonderful product, worth every penny I've spent on this. Just want to make one suggestion, the key pad should be backlighted.
customer_reviews.author: Maung Htoo

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint scanner is horrible.  Does not work anymore. Less than 1 month old.
customer_reviews.text: The fingerprint scanner is almost impossible to work. It worked quite well in consistently for the first week. Now it won’t work and Constantly locks up. Installing the batteries for the inside light was a real pain. Definitely not user-friendly. I am probably going to return the safe and look for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great safe, but came without keys & instructions.
customer_reviews.text: THE SAFE ITSELF LOOKS FINE AND IT IS ACTUALLY A GREAT SAFE. HOWEVER, HOW DID IT COME WITHOUT INSTRUCTIONS OR THE KEYS TO OPEN IT?!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Just as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. Fingerprint scanner is a little temperamental, but I can generally get it to work. I do like that you can use a personal code as well, and there are keys to open it, too. It came missing some shelf clips, however their customer service was excellent in rectifying this issue. I do love my safe and feel much more secure having it. I would definitely recommend this safe!
customer_reviews.author: SuSu

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Shelves are flimsey safe is small and sledge hammer and 15 minutes will smoke it
customer_reviews.author: patrick anderson

customer_reviews.title: "Fingerprint open" works well, spacious and carpeted inside. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good safe for the price. Everything is as advertised and I especially like the fact that it is carpeted inside, even the 3 shelf's are carpeted. You have pre-drilled mounting holes on the bottom and the back of the safe. Easy to operate and you have three ways to open it (Fingerprint, combo or Key). Last but not least, it's spacious inside!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size for Keeping Items Safe
customer_reviews.text: We received this purchase quickly. We had some trouble with the locking mechanism. Contacted customer service and they were very helpful. We received a second safe and it worked perfect. Enough room for the items we want to store and keep safe. Returned the first quickly and easily. Excellent communication. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: FLgmapurseon

customer_reviews.title: Works As Intended...
customer_reviews.text: The size of this safe is perfect for securing an assortment of pistols, ammo, & a small cache of jewelry, passports, paperwork, etc. We found that storing & using codes was a straight-forward process, however, the fingerprint operation was a bit more tricky (generally works better when applying the right amount of pressure to the scanner pad). Overall, a very satisfactory product thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent safe
customer_reviews.text: I own a Barska safe and this is basically an identical product. I hoped it would be a bit bigger and it is lighter than I expected, a thief definitely could take the whole thing and eventually get it open. The LED light is a nice surprise. Overall I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Crankshaft

customer_reviews.title: A highly reliable, biometric sensor makes this a winner!
customer_reviews.text: A great value in a small footprint safe, which features a very easy to use and HIGHLY reliable biometric fingerprint sensor. Once you go through the setup, you will find flawless operation of the biometric sensor. As a double backup, you have a numeric keypad combination lock as well as a keylock system, to gain entry. Super product for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Garry A. Faegenburg

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The safe is exactly as advertised. Solid construction, tamper proof cylinders and an effective fingerprint reader. I did have one issue with the programming mechanism. I contacted customer service and received a thorough troubleshooting checklist. As soon as I completed that and let them know what I found, they offered to replace the safe. I requested the parts to replace what wasn't working. They shipped the parts quickly and extended my warranty. Once I got the parts it was a quick 15 minute fix. I wish everyone had customer service like that!
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for guns and jewelry
customer_reviews.text: This safe is a fantastic value and great gun safe. I paired it with HYSKORE 6 Gun Modular Pistol Rack which fits on 1 of the 3 shelves with plenty of room for ammo and jewelry. I would recommend this over and over!
customer_reviews.author: HockeyGuy

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE. DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The safe that I received appears to be either used or refurbished. Lock motor does not work, makes a strange noise. Safe is useless. Spent several hours trying to get it to work properly, Finally gave up, requested a return label from Amazon. Absolute junk, and the customer service was of zero value.
customer_reviews.author: J Kane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This safe has saved me many of times cause of the fingerprint system!! Never had a problem with this safe easy to use the fingerprint part and opens rite away!! They make special keys to get into the safe and I missed placed them and they have been very helpful but also making sure I was the right owner with showing proof!! Thank u
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: The sensor was glued into position poorly and its 'wings' needed to be bent to make good contact with the lock
customer_reviews.text: I wrote earlier about my difficulty getting a response from the service dept. It turns out that the service dept is one person who was away for a family issue. She responded promptly when she returned to work and solved my problem with the safe lock mechanism. The sensor was glued into position poorly and its 'wings' needed to be bent to make good contact with the lock. Now the door locks properly. I like the safe - it's solid and convenient. I'm just a bit concerned about the quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lidstrom

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, cheap on the inside
customer_reviews.text: Well-made box. Inside is cheap - flimsy shelves are thinner than cookie sheets, gray felt glued on crooked and over the mounting holes. Little plastic tabs hold up the shelves, I couldn't figure out how to take them out and broke several. It takes sort of a squeeze-and-pivot out movement to take out the tabs and move the shelves up or down - not in the directions. I registered most of my fingers, in different positions. Many fingers don't work consistently.
customer_reviews.author: l. candry

customer_reviews.title: It's a little pricey, but print is great for things that go bump in the night.
customer_reviews.text: Really good safe. I have 3; from giant ones you can't hardly move with a dolly, to little ones that aren't even fire proof. It did concern me when they said print reader doesn't read old prints. Being an old mechanic I used a mag. glass to get the best one, but it is great- no problem.
customer_reviews.author: David 8541

customer_reviews.title: Great safe
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday and love it. I made sure I used 2 fingers and set each finger like 10-15 times so it will accept 2 of my fingers no matter how I place it on the screen. Was easy to set up and able to change code. I absolutely love it, nice size.
customer_reviews.author: dawnmarie 143

customer_reviews.title: Had a problem with the first safe, Viking sent ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with the first safe, Viking sent me a replacement. It was difficult reaching customer service and some confusion; however, in the end it all worked out to my satisfaction!
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Great safe
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely liked the safe and it’s abilities. However, pay close attention to the depth of safe and how height dimensions. It’s is an awkward shape and very tall for its depth. If your not mounting to wall or on top of something it does seem “top heavy”. Otherwise great safe. Finger reader is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Emily G.

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it Simple
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mom. She is 92 years young. A regular combination safe would be to complicated to learn at this age.I was able to program it for all of her fingers. She is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy A.

customer_reviews.title: 1st Viking Safe is great, the 2nd one not so much. Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Viking bio metric safe. I would give the finger print reader zero stars if I could as it drains the batteries with in 3 weeks. The first safe the batteries lasted over a year. I am hoping Viking will replace the the electronics or send a new one. UPdate sent an email to the company via thier website and they replied "Thanks for your email. We'll get back to you as soon as possible!" on November 21 and I have not heard from them since.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Worst Safe Ever.  Will not stay Locked.
customer_reviews.text: Safe will not stay locked. Lock the Safe and it is fine, except 90% of the time you can walk up and press * or # and the Safe will Unlock, Door Swings Open, and Safe ReLocks without needing any Code or Fingerprint. Definitely NOT SECURE. Thought might be the Batteries so Replaced, Twice, with same results. Would return but to heavy to bother.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good solid security box
customer_reviews.text: Like the number pad security along with the key backup option, good solid metal box, finger biometric did not work well for me. Maybe a better print scanner. Would help.
customer_reviews.author: Gareth

customer_reviews.title: Great size - just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Everything as described. Putting in internal light batteries somewhat awkward but it was accomplished :) Now 2 month after installation fingerprint reader is working as intended on original batteries. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Vad Beren

customer_reviews.title: There are a lot better safes out there but there are also a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Not Fire proof. Shelf bracket was broken on delivery - brackets made from cheap plastic. Otherwise a decent safe for the price. There are a lot better safes out there but there are also a lot worse.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Love my NEW Biometric Viking Safe
customer_reviews.text: Easy Setup of both digital and fingerprint set up. Instructions were clear and concise. Love the LED LIGHT!! Will buy again a bigger biometric safe for my rifles.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: Great safe
customer_reviews.text: Great safe, finger print works perfect, like the size, it is perfect for 4 hand guns and mags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Contents inside the safe were damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present for my boyfriend. When we opened the safe all the styrofoam was completely broken inside and a majority of the clips were broken, as well....Thankfully it does come with extras. However, the main reason for the three stars is that all three shelves were damaged. Two of them had corners bent, while one of the shelves was completely twisted and unfortunately doesn’t sit right on the clips now. I’m so bummed cause the safe itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very good safe!
customer_reviews.text: This safe is great, but I quickly ran out of space. I now need something larger.
customer_reviews.author: Len L.

customer_reviews.title: Walls (not door) appear thin but access is easy and 4 shelves useful
customer_reviews.text: Walls (not door) appear thin but access is easy and 4 shelves useful. Anchoring bolts not easy to install. Good for moderate home use, would not store the crown jewels here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love my safe. It’s convenience with the fingerprint scan is the best. I was thinking about buying one for my son as a gift. I keep 4 handguns in it and still have room for more.
customer_reviews.author: Ford Family

customer_reviews.title: Safe it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this safe. Great for keeping small important items locked away. The light that's installed really helps, be cause my safe is stored in a closet. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Batteries drain very fast
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with how quickly the batteries are drained. I've had the safe in place for about 4 months and have had to change the batteries out 3 times already. Would not buy again - the battery is what allows you to open it with your fingerprint or code. Now I get stuck opening it with the key which is a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad security vault... I store alot in there and the finger print mechanism works just fine... I'm loving it
customer_reviews.author: Marco Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Best EVER
customer_reviews.text: Not only was this safe AS ADVERTISED....but the seller is AWESOME! When I am in need of a more personal size or even larger safe.......I know who I am using! Thanks for the great response in getting me the replacement clips......and in record time. Such things are so unheard of today. This seller should be proud of not only the products, but in himself!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Solid safe and really heavy. I love the light inside and shelves
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Finger print reader doesn’t always work. I would say it’s over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Teanna Hole

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life , Great biometric safe .
customer_reviews.text: I have had this sage for just under 2 year (Feb 2016) and have nothing but good things to say about it. 1st and foremost of importance is the biometric sensor , if works amazingly , you would almost thing this came from a multi thousand dollar safe. Secondly the original batteries are still going strong , and while I don't get into it every day I get in it multiple days a week. WONDERFUL SAFE AND WONDERFUL QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Security Safe.
customer_reviews.text: Nice safe for valuables and easy setup. Biometrics work well and I plan to secure it to the wall and floor in my closet. Nice item.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo C.

customer_reviews.title: no go
customer_reviews.text: If you have guns and kids THIS IS NOT THE SAFE !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Service is great.  Love bio metric option
customer_reviews.text: Safe works easily with bio metrics. Service is outstanding. Called last week after 2 years where I did setup my light and was missing a piece. They sent me a complete New lightning set which now works.
customer_reviews.author: @SecurityFawcett

customer_reviews.title: Great safe for the price
customer_reviews.text: This safe did exactly what it was needed for. It’s small and fits prefect where I needed it to fit. The finger print option is so cool. Everyone that sees it is in awe.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Roomy big enough to store documents hand guns etc... instructions were easy to follow light on inside could be brighter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cheap and secure
customer_reviews.text: Great product made in the US. Have had it for a while with no issues at all. Best product for the price, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I use it for jewelry and the multiple shelves are great for that. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Carol H Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice safe is to use and to set up and can have more than one fingerprint accessible which is great.
customer_reviews.author: patsbosox63

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Safe is damaged a bit on a couple edges and didn’t come with any keys so I can’t get into it. Very frustrating because I was looking forward to it’s arrival. Haven’t gotten a hold of customer service yet...update will be coming after
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Best safe for the money hands down!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this safe more stars if I could. In addition to an absolutely amazing safe their customer service is outstanding. I've owned several biometric safes in the last few years but none have come close to the quality of this one. If you were on the fence between the $180 model and this one for $250 let me assure you that it would be money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: E. Prine

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best safe!!!! I have had problems of my own accord with forgetting how to program it, there was a malfunction on the lcd panel, and NOW I can’t find the key. Every time without fail, Viking helped me out. They go above and beyond backing their safe!!! Also, customer relations is top notch!!! They were empathetic to my situation not once, but EVERY time. I am probably one of the toughest consumers, so for me to state this goes above and beyond. I researched what I needed, and they superseded my expectations!!!! If someone is writing a bad review?? It’s ridiculous!!!! There’s nothing that this company wouldn’t do to help. That’s rare anymore.
customer_reviews.author: D.Ross

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: product appeared to have been opened and or previously used.
customer_reviews.author: Contractor

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice safe
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to install, but sometimes the fingerprint has problem reading. Just wipe off your finger and the sensor part and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the safe walls are too thin and can easily be cut with an electric saw
customer_reviews.text: Except for the door, the safe walls are too thin and can easily be cut with an electric saw.
customer_reviews.author: Mega Resveratrol

customer_reviews.title: Love our new safe
customer_reviews.text: Love our new safe! Shipped fast, programming was easy. Shelving and clips a little flimsy but overall a nice setup for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sesta

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the stackon model
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the stackon model. The finger print recognition never fails as compared to other units on the market. This is an outstanding and well made product, Worth the upgrade price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Viking Gun Safe
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Viking Gun Safe! Vicking’s Customer Service was quick responding to my questions. The quality of the safe is excellent! I would recommend this safe to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: amazing safe
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with my purchase. Has quick access to open and close the safe with the fingerprint scanner. loves the shelves as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How does a safe get shipped without the key
customer_reviews.text: We receieved the safe but no manual and no key. It is completely inoperable as it was receieved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only downside to the safe is that the keypad isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Only downside to the safe is that the keypad isn't backlit so in darkness it makes it rather impossible to type in the code.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K.

customer_reviews.title: LCD Display Cracked
customer_reviews.text: The safe arrived with the LCD screen cracked. It still functions properly but looks bad, huge hassle for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Best safe on Amazon hands down
customer_reviews.text: Best safe on Amazon hands down... Going on two years and this guy works just as good as day one. Also the fingerprint scanner works perfectly... I have had no issues in the last 2 years since i have purchased this, and as far as the keys go, I have no problem seeing what key i am pressing to lock or unlock this. I am assuming the people that have issues with the keys are either blind, old, or just dumb and cant figure out how to press a button correctly..
customer_reviews.author: Jerett Mignot

customer_reviews.title: Well made safetybox
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size perfect funtion And good customer service and nice staff Well satisfied
customer_reviews.author: JONGMIN

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing I ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I'm sending it back ,its the cheapest thing I've ever seen
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: LED switch/piece broke off
customer_reviews.text: This safe is great but my metal switch/piece that turns on and off the LED light when you open/close the door broke off so now the light stays on indefinitely
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great safe, arrived without issue and easy to set-up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Salty

customer_reviews.title: Good value but Anchors might not be adequate for you
customer_reviews.text: Good value, easy to use, fairly sturdy. The anchors didn't work for us so you may need to get another set, which really isn't a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not be dissappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Worth the buy. Plenty of secure fail safes to open the safe.
customer_reviews.author: Beamer

customer_reviews.title: not at this price ...
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality for something that costs this much. You can get something much better for less. The finger print reader is slow and inconsistent. The key pad buttons are very small and has no back lit light, so it's pretty hard to use especially in low light. I've read that some reviewers are using it to store the gun ... good luck in an emergency situation.
customer_reviews.author: pt

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This safe was easy to program and perfect for its use.
customer_reviews.author: Prisburg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice safe for the price and works well; occasionally have to put finger on reader more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Carter

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing safe
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing I was very excited to get this safe It will not forget it original code. And it opens when ever I push the number sign. My only real option is to remove batteries and use the key I went to the website to contact factory. And they don't have a phone number for support. I'm sure some work okay but mine does not
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Sterman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sweet little safe. Heavy, easy to use, very handy. Perfect for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Joey L.

customer_reviews.title: Great safe, needs better packaging
customer_reviews.text: Safe is exactly what I was looking for! My only issue was that the safe arrived without the shelves secured inside which broke several of the shelf clips and made it impossible to use all of the shelving units.
customer_reviews.author: SnittyKitty67

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Description was fair but this is obviously a cheaply manufactured mass produced safe. Shelves are thin plastic, outer casing looks like will break with a hammer, internal LED is cheap and didnt work at 1st, and finger lock is not instant, its a sluggish open. Wish would have mentioned that the key pad is not lit. How am I supposed to open this in the dark with a non lighting keypad?
customer_reviews.author: Greg L.

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this safe for my 73 year old mother who is blind. I registered her right thumb fingerprint with 8 different positions and it opens every time for her. She is very happy with it. The more variation in position of fingerprint, the better. This is a small company that strands by their product.
customer_reviews.author: Dao Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected. I wanted this to store handguns and some valuables. A little rough around the edges, but great value for the dollar. Quick and easy to put batteries in the light and the lock mechanism, and to program my fingerprint. Very happy with the safe.
customer_reviews.author: ckw

customer_reviews.title: ... safe very upset about this but overall still a great safe vs now the damage i see everyday
customer_reviews.text: It would get five stars but at start the cover that covers the key hole is so so tight i was unable to remove with some damage to the safe very upset about this but overall still a great safe vs now the damage i see everyday
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: keypad broken but still working. For safety, please ...
customer_reviews.text: keypad broken but still working. For safety, please go find other products and pay more money. for keeping things away from kids, it works. not fit for completist
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Can't adjust the shelves!
customer_reviews.text: I need help adjusting the shelves without breaking the clips.
customer_reviews.author: NJH

customer_reviews.title: I just opened the box last night, no damage ...
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box last night, no damage to the box but the plastic screen has multiple cracks. Is it possible to send me a new screen face? There were also 2 of the shelf supports that were broken.
customer_reviews.author: Architectural Casework Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Super happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Super happy with it. Go bigger, go bigger, go bigger. We had a small document safe and decided to upgrade and forgo the fire and water resistance. Filled it to capacity with five minutes of setting it up. Love the product though and are thinking of getting a second for the office.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seller, great safe
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it claims to be. Fingerprint reader works great, and the safe itself is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Viking Security Safe VS-50BLX Large Biometric Safe Fingerprint Safe
product_meta.description:
Locking system: Biometric Fingerprint Reader and Digital LCD Keypad, Upgraded 500 DPI Optical sensor, PIN Code consists of 4-8 programmable digits, Battery status and Operations displayed, Motorized deadbolt locking mechanism with 2 pry-resistant insertion slots, Four prong override cross keys (2 included)

Safety features: Pry-resistant, Laser cut, Seamlessly welded, 20 mm Solid steel Locking bars enter two insertion slots in the frame of the safe, Sound On/Off, Warning beep if door left unlocked for more than 1 min., Time out period after 5 incorrect PINs or 10 incorrect fingerprints attempts 

Body material:Steel, Black scratch resistant military coating

Interior:All carpeted, Build in LED light with 2 AA Batteries (included), key hooks, 3 fully adjustable shelves

Memory:Stores up to 32 fingerprints and 1 PIN code; Non-volatile memory – information is retained if batteries are removed

NOT Fire/Waterproof 

Mounting:4 pre-drilled holes with anchor bolts (included) for convenient mounting

Batteries:Requires 4 AA batteries (included)

Door/Body Thickness:5 mm/2 mm

External Dimensions: H 16.69” (508 mm) x W 13.78”(305 mm) x D 12.21” (355 mm)

Internal Dimensions:H 19.29” (502 mm) x W 12.5” (298 mm) x D 9.25” (349 mm)

Weight:43 lbs. (20 kg)

Warranty:One-Year limited Warranty

Production:Designed in USA, made in China.
feature_bullets: HIGHLY SECURE 20” x 14” x 12” BIOMETRIC FINGERPRINT SAFE - Unlocks Fast by Registered Fingerprint or PIN Code. Access you gun, handgun, pistol, ammunition in second.

FAST ACCESS PERSONAL SAFE FOR HOME & OFFICE DEFENSE AND PROTECTION – Upgraded 500 DPI Optical Sensor, Motorized 20mm deadbolt locking mechanism with 2 pry-resistant insertion slots, 5mm door, Seamless Laser Cut, Four Prong Backup Cross Key

EASY TO SET UP & SIMPLE TO USE - Scan & Save up to 32 Fingerprints for Multiple People or 1 PIN Code, All Carpeted interior with Build in LED Light, 3 FULLY ADJUSTABLE shelves to organize your handguns, Jewelry, Cash, Electronics & Important Documents

PRY-RESISTANT by DESIGN, TIGHTLY SEALED SOLID STEEL BODY GUN SAFE - Two 20 mm Solid Steel Locking bars go inside of 2 insertion slots in the frame of the safe, Sound On/Off so that intruders won't hear you, Warning beep if door left unlocked
External Dimensions: H 19.69” (508 mm) x W 13.78”(305 mm) x D 12.21” (355 mm); Weight: 48 lbs. (22 kg);
